**Government Tender Announcement: Lease of Portable VHF Radio Sets**

**Notice Details**

* Title: Lease of Portable VHF Radio Sets
* Reference Number: WS4167388841-Basedoc4469638323
* Solicitation Number: WS4167388841
* Publication Date: March 1, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: March 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: Goods for Defence
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Delivery Regions**

* Winnipeg
* Calgary
* Vancouver

**Contact Information**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact Person: Matthew Havrilenko (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Bid Requirements**

* Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and their best and final offer by the tender closing date.
* Failure to comply with these requirements will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

**Key Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the lease of portable VHF radio sets. The lease will be for a period of two (2) years, with three (3) option periods of one (1) year each. The equipment must be interoperable in a non-secure mode with other military specific radios in the same frequency band. It is expected that the leased equipment will be used by the 3rd Canadian Division (3 Cdn Div) to meet their short-term requirements.
